MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 postcode area of Rhosllanerchrugog, affecting properties in Hall Street, Swan Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:35PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating following reports of third party damage.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:52PM on 24th November 2020.
